ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New wind instrument?
ygData.msgSnippet: On the subject of new instruments, I was hunting with my Iksar the other day and came across a Froglok Fife. It s Lore, but not No Drop. All / All weight 0.1
ygData.messageBody:
On the subject of new instruments, I was hunting with my Iksar the other day
and came across a Froglok Fife. It's Lore, but not No Drop. All / All weight
0.1 I'm eager to get one with my bard and to see if it provides any
benefit. (although I doubt it will)

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:jasonf@...]
Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 10:45 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New wind instrument?


This would have to be one hell of an instrument to get me to play it.
Blowing through a hollow dead insect leg is not something I want to role
play.

[50 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

>
> Does anyone know if the Drachnid Leg Part can be used as a wind
> instrument? And if so, are there any % modifiers?
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Xegony
>
